Farther from where the Maximal was, Ultra Magnum stopped dead in his
tracks=
 as he heard mention of Megatron up in the sky.

Magnum: Megatron? Megatron=
?!?!

His hatred swelled inside his spark like a flood, spilling over,
slow=
ly but surely taking over his reasoning. He turns over to Razorwing.

Magnu=
m: Is this a bad joke of yours, milord?

He was getting more and more aggre=
ssive by the moment. Unnerved, he
transforms and readies all his (very impr=
essive) weapon systems.

Deadfur was still separate from the group, and rad=
ioed Razorwing as
soon as he realized something was amiss.

Deafur: Razorwi=
ng, it seems like there's a bot hovering above the
city, proclaiming he's M=
egatron. No ID confirmation yet, but the
prelim checks I got from your peop=
le seem to point out this guy looks
and feels like the real deal. You know,=
 I didn't have enough with the
Minions either.
